title: Prasada
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: Small vegetarian restaurant with 6 tables and free Wi-Fi, in San Blas neighborhood at this space since 2015; previously a snack bar at Choquechaca 152. Offers a weekday lunch menu set that includes soup or salad, main dish, and small dessert. A la carte menu offers veggie burgers plus pasta, pizza, salad, and fresh juices.
